Uses of Class
jalse.actions.MultiActionBuilder

  • Packages that use MultiActionBuilder 
    Package Description
    jalse.actions
    This package is for scheduling and managing Action (like Runnable but with a ActionContext and potentially associated actor).

    • Uses of MultiActionBuilder in jalse.actions

      Methods in jalse.actions that return MultiActionBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <S> MultiActionBuilder<S> MultiActionBuilder.newBuilder(Action<S> action)
      Creates a new builder instance.
      static <S> MultiActionBuilder<S> MultiActionBuilder.newBuilder(java.util.List<? extends Action<S>> actions)
      Creates a new builder instance.
      MultiActionBuilder<T> MultiActionBuilder.then(Action<T> action)
      Adds an action to be performed next.
      MultiActionBuilder<T> MultiActionBuilder.then(java.util.List<? extends Action<T>> actions)
      Adds a chain of actions to be performed in sequence.
      MultiActionBuilder<T> MultiActionBuilder.thenSchedule(Action<T> action)
      Adds an action to be scheduled.
      MultiActionBuilder<T> MultiActionBuilder.thenSchedule(java.util.Collection<? extends Action<T>> actions)
      Adds a number of actions to be scheduled.
      MultiActionBuilder<T> MultiActionBuilder.thenScheduleAndAwait(java.util.Collection<? extends Action<T>> actions)
      Adds a number of actions to be scheduled then awaited.
